meanings.def: soft leather made from the skin of a young goat
examples: a pair of white kid gloves

meanings.def: to deal with somebody in a very careful way so that you do not offend or upset them
examples: Treat her with kid gloves—she's very sensitive.

meanings.def: something that is so easy to do or understand that it is thought to be not very serious or only suitable for children
examples: That was kids' stuff compared with what lies ahead.
The movie is pure kids' stuff from beginning to end.

meanings.def: a person who is new to a place, an organization, etc.
examples: Despite his six years in politics, he was still regarded by many as the new kid on the block.

meanings.def: to tell somebody something that is not true, especially as a joke
examples: I thought he was kidding when he said he was going out with a rock star.

meanings.def: to allow somebody/yourself to believe something that is not true
examples: kid somebody/yourself They're kidding themselves if they think it's going to be easy.
kid somebody/yourself (that)… I tried to kid myself (that) everything was normal.

meanings.def: used to emphasize that something is true or that you agree with something that somebody has just said

meanings.def: used to show that you mean what you are saying
